price: Enti deε wͻretwεn ara ne, wͻn a wͻdii wͻn anim kan kͻeε no nna no sεso? (Nkͻmhyεni), kasε: “Ɛneε montwεn, me nso meka mo ne wͻn a wͻretwεn no ho”.
arabic: فَهَلۡ يَنتَظِرُونَ إِلَّا مِثۡلَ أَيَّامِ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ قُلۡ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fahal yantaẓirūna illā mith'la ayyāmi alladhīna khalaw min qablihim qul fa-intaẓirū innī maʿakum mina al-muntaẓirīna
